description.brief: a ROS-package to generate and use Mandani Fuzzy controllers (MISO)

package.description: The mofs is based on the C++ library called mofs (Miguel Olivares Fuzzy Software). I have been using this library to control different kind of robots/vehicles like a wheelchair, unamnned helicopters, quadrotors, and a citroen C3. With this implemented ROS package I'm trying to share in the best way this software, hope that it could be useful for a many people.
package.author: Miguel A. Olivares-Mendez
